raw_chunks:
[PAGE 1]
This is a test document for AI-3 DataFactory integration.

Section 1: Introduction
This document tests the complete RAG pipeline from AI-4 to AI-3.
The DataFactory on AI-3 handles OCR, chunking, enrichment, and embedding.

Section 2: Key Features
- Automatic OCR detection for scanned PDFs
- 5 different chunking strategies (page_plus_table_aware is recommended)
- 6x parallel LLM enrichment
- BGE-m3 embeddings (1024-dim)
- FAISS vector search with deduplication

Section 3: Performance
Small documents (1-2MB): 30-60 seconds
Medium documents (5-10MB): 2-3 minutes
Large documents (45MB+): 8-10 minutes
Throughput: ~5 MB/min

Section 4: Quality Metrics
OCR Accuracy: 95%+
Chunk Quality: LLM-enhanced
Search Accuracy: 67%+ validated
Embedding Quality: state-of-the-art BGE-m3

Section 5: Conclusion
The AI-3 DataFactory provides production-ready RAG capabilities
for AI-4 to build user-facing applications.
